title: Viewer
text:
Data Viewer
This section is reserved for interactive viewers or embedded components.
You can later add iframes, TEI XML renderers, or RDF browsers here.

title: prodatphil
text:
Welcome to the PRODATPHIL Pilot Website
This is a pilot platform for exploring digital tools in the humanities.
You can find interactive data viewers, dashboards, and example notebooks here.
Navigate using the menu above.

title: About
text:
About This Project
The PRODATPHIL project aims to support research data infrastructures in the humanities.
This pilot site was built using Quarto and is hosted via GitHub Pages.
It demonstrates possible components for: - TEI/RDF data viewing - Interactive dashboards - Code notebooks for research documentation

title: Dashboard
text:
Dashboard
This page will host interactive dashboards created with tools like Plotly, Leaflet, or embedded charts.
Coming soon!

title: Notebooks
text:
Research Notebooks
This page will contain example Jupyter or Quarto notebooks for reproducible research.
